articles.description: Nurmagomedov's dad had been battling Covid-19 for several months and his condition worsened over the last few days
articles.content:
Khabib Nurmagomedov's father - who doubled as his coach - has passed away at the age of 57 following a long battle with Covid-19.
Abdulmanap Nurmagomedov was struck down with coronavirus in April an… [+3208 chars]

articles.title: Dimitar Berbatov explains why Man Utd may have made Bruno Fernandes transfer mistake - Mirror Online
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: Manchester United were linked with Bruno Fernandes in the summer, and were expected to make a big-money move for him, but waited until the January transfer window
articles.content:
Dimitar Berbatov says Manchester United may have made a mistake in not signing Bruno Fernandes earlier than they did.
